00028 const QString LaUtils::userSettingsDirPath()
00029 {
00030   QSettings mySettings;
00031   QString myPath=
00032       mySettings.value("dataDirs/dataDir", QDir::homePath() + QString("/.landuseAnalyst/") ).toString();
00033     //  Make sure the users settings dir actually exists
00034     //  //qDebug("LaUtils::userSettingsDirPath() = " + myPath.toLocal8Bit());
00035   QDir().mkpath(myPath);
00036   return myPath;
00037 }
00038 const QString LaUtils::getModelOutputDir()
00039 {
00040   QString myPath = userSettingsDirPath()+QDir::separator()+"modelOutputs"+QDir::separator();
00041   QDir().mkpath(myPath);
00042   return myPath;
00043 }

00064 LaUtils::AnimalMap LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals()
00065 {
00066   LaUtils::AnimalMap myMap;
00067   QDir myDirectory(userAnimalProfilesDirPath());
00068   myDirectory.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Files | QDir::NoSymLinks );
00069   QFileInfoList myList = myDirectory.entryInfoList();
00070   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(myList.size()); ++i)
00071   {
00072     QFileInfo myFileInfo = myList.at(i);
00073       //Ignore directories
00074     if(myFileInfo.fileName() == "." ||myFileInfo.fileName() == ".." )
00075     {
00076       continue;
00077     }
00078       //if the filename ends in .xml try to load it into our layerSets listing
00079     if(myFileInfo.completeSuffix()=="xml")
00080     {
00081         //  //qDebug("Loading animal: " + myList.at(i).absoluteFilePath().toLocal8Bit());
00082       LaAnimal myAnimal;
00083       myAnimal.fromXmlFile(myFileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00084       if (myAnimal.name().isEmpty())
00085       {
00086           //qDebug("Animal name was empty!");
00087         continue;
00088       }
00089         //  //qDebug("Adding " + myAnimal.name());
00090         //  //qDebug(myAnimal.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00091       myMap[myAnimal.guid()]=myAnimal;
00092     }
00093   }
00094   return myMap;
00095 }
00096 LaAnimal LaUtils::getAnimal(QString theGuid)
00097 {
00098   QDir myDirectory(userAnimalProfilesDirPath());

00102   {
00103     QFileInfo myFileInfo = myList.at(i);
00104       //Ignore directories
00105     if(myFileInfo.fileName() == "." ||myFileInfo.fileName() == ".." )
00106     {
00107       continue;
00108     }
00109       //if the filename ends in .xml try to load it into our layerSets listing
00110     if(myFileInfo.completeSuffix()=="xml")
00111     {
00112         //  //qDebug("Loading animal: " + myList.at(i).absoluteFilePath().toLocal8Bit());
00113       LaAnimal myAnimal;
00114       myAnimal.fromXmlFile(myFileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00115       if (myAnimal.name().isEmpty())
00116       {
00117           //qDebug("Animal name was empty!");
00118         continue;
00119       }
00120         //  //qDebug("Adding " + myAnimal.name());
00121         //  //qDebug(myAnimal.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00122       if (myAnimal.guid()==theGuid)
00123       {
00124         return myAnimal;
00125       }
00126     }
00127   }
00128   LaAnimal myAnimal;   //blank animal
00129   return myAnimal;
00130 }

00234 
00235 int LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(AreaUnits theAreaUnit, int theArea)
00236 {
00237     // this may seem ridiculous to do it this way, but
00238     // i plan to include other area units and this way
00239     // it will make it very easy to work with in the future
00240     // all need be done is add new units to la.h enum and enter
00241     // into the following switch...
00242 
00243   float myHectares = 0.;
00244 
00245   switch (theAreaUnit)    // Dunum, Hectare
00246   {
00247     case  Dunum:
00248       myHectares = theArea * 10.;
00249       break;
00250     case  Hectare:
00251       myHectares = theArea;
00252       break;   /*    add new units here after updating la.h enum ex:
00253     case  Acre:
00254       HyHectares = theArea / 2.47105381;
00255       break;     */
00256   }
00257   return static_cast<int>(myHectares);
00258 }

00260 LaUtils::AnimalParameterMap LaUtils::getAvailableAnimalParameters()
00261 {
00262   LaUtils::AnimalParameterMap myMap;
00263   QDir myDirectory(userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath());
00264   myDirectory.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Files | QDir::NoSymLinks );
00265   QFileInfoList myList = myDirectory.entryInfoList();
00266   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(myList.size()); ++i)
00267   {
00268     QFileInfo myFileInfo = myList.at(i);
00269       //Ignore directories
00270     if(myFileInfo.fileName() == "." ||myFileInfo.fileName() == ".." )
00271     {
00272       continue;
00273     }
00274       //if the filename ends in .xml try to load it into our layerSets listing
00275     if(myFileInfo.completeSuffix()=="xml")
00276     {
00277         //  //qDebug("Loading animalParameter: " + myList.at(i).absoluteFilePath().toLocal8Bit());
00278       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter;
00279       myAnimalParameter.fromXmlFile(myFileInfo.absoluteFilePath());
00280       if (myAnimalParameter.name().isEmpty())
00281       {
00282           //qDebug("AnimalParameter name was empty!");
00283         continue;
00284       }
00285         //  //qDebug("Adding " + myAnimalParameter.name());
00286         //  //qDebug(myAnimalParameter.toText().toLocal8Bit());

00288 
00289 
00290         //for debug only...
00291       ;
00292         //qDebug(" ++ lautil  Restoring " +
00293         //    QString::number(myAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap().count()).toLocal8Bit()
00294         //    + " food sources into animal parameter.");
00295     }
00296   }
00297   return myMap;

00408 QStringList LaUtils::sortList(QStringList theList)
00409 {
00410       //sort the taxon list alpabetically descending order
00411     theList.sort();   //this sorts ascending!
00412       //flip the sort order
00413     QStringList mySortedList;
00414     QStringList::Iterator myIterator= theList.end();
00415     while( myIterator!=theList.begin() )
00416     {
00417       myIterator--;
00418       mySortedList << *myIterator;
00419     }
00420     return mySortedList;
00421 }
00422 
00423 QStringList LaUtils::uniqueList(QStringList theList)
00424 {
00425       //remove any duplicates from a sorted list
00426     QStringList myUniqueList;
00427     QString myLast = "";
00428     QStringListIterator myIterator( theList );
00429     while( myIterator.hasNext() )
00430     {
00431       QString myCurrent = myIterator.next();
00432       if (myCurrent!=myLast)
00433       {
00434         myUniqueList << myCurrent;
00435       }
00436       myLast=myCurrent;
00437     }
00438     return myUniqueList;
00439 }
00440 
00441   //return a string list of all the experiment files
00442 QStringList LaUtils::getExperimentsList()
00443 {
00444   QStringList myExperimentList;
00445   QSettings mySettings;
00446   QString myWorkDir = mySettings.value("dataDirs/dataDir",QDir::homePath()+QDir::separator()+".landuseAnalyst").toString()+
00447                       QString("/modelOutputs/");
00448   QDir myDirectory(myWorkDir);
00449   myDirectory.setFilter(QDir::Dirs | QDir::Files | QDir::NoSymLinks );
00450     //  //qDebug ("Current directory is: " +  myWorkDir.toAscii());
00451   QFileInfoList myList = myDirectory.entryInfoList();
00452   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(myList.size()); ++i)
00453   {
00454     QFileInfo myFileInfo = myList.at(i);
00455       //  //qDebug("Get ExperimentsList Scanning : " + myFileInfo.fileName().toLocal8Bit());
00456     if(myFileInfo.fileName() == "." ||myFileInfo.fileName() == ".." )
00457     {
00458       continue;
00459     }
00460       //if this is an empty dir, just skip it...
00461     if (myFileInfo.absoluteDir().count() < 1)
00462     {
00463       continue;
00464     }
00465       //todo - check that the file is a directory (it should be)
00466 
00467       //Now look in each dir under the workdir for the xml experiment file
00468       //the experiment file should be named <dir name>.xml
00469     QString myFile = myFileInfo.absolutePath() + QDir::separator()
00470                                  + myFileInfo.fileName() + QDir::separator()
00471                                  + myFileInfo.fileName() + ".xml";
00472       //  //qDebug("Get ExperimentsList Checking: " + myFile.toLocal8Bit());
00473     if (QFile::exists(myFile))
00474     {
00475       myExperimentList << myFile;
00476         //  //qDebug("Get ExperimentsList Adding: " + myFile.toLocal8Bit());
00477     }
00478   }
00479   return myExperimentList;
00480 }
00481 
00482 bool LaUtils::createTextFile(QString theFileName, QString theData)
00483 {
00484     //create the txt file
00485   QFile myFile( theFileName );
00486   if ( myFile.open( QIODevice::WriteOnly ) )
00487   {
00488     QTextStream myQTextStream( &myFile );
00489     myQTextStream << theData;
00490   }
00491   else
00492   {
00493     return false;
00494   }
00495   myFile.close();
00496   return true ;
00497 }
00498 
00499 QString LaUtils::xmlEncode(QString theString)
00500 {
00501   theString = theString.replace("<","&lt;");
00502   theString = theString.replace(">","&gt;");
00503   theString = theString.replace("&","&amp;");
00504   return theString;
00505 }
00506 
00507 QString LaUtils::xmlDecode(QString theString)
00508 {
00509   theString = theString.replace("&lt;","<");
00510   theString = theString.replace("&gt;",">");
00511   theString = theString.replace("&amp;","&");
00512   return theString;
00513 }

00515 QString LaUtils::getStandardCss()
00516 {
00517   QString myStyle = ".glossy{ background-color: qlineargradient(x1:0, y1:0, x2:0, y2:1, stop:0 #616161, stop: 0.5 #505050, stop: 0.6 #434343, stop:1 #656565); color: white; padding-left: 4px; border: 1px solid #6c6c6c; }";
00518   myStyle += "body {background: white;}";
00519   myStyle += "h1 {font-size : 22pt; color: #0063F7; }";
00520   myStyle += "h2 {font-size : 18pt; color: #0063F7; }";
00521   myStyle += "h3 {font-size : 14pt; color: #0063F7; }";
00522   myStyle += ".cellHeader {color:#466aa5; font-size : 12pt;}";
00523   myStyle += ".parameterHeader {font-weight: bold;}";
00524   myStyle += ".largeCell {color:#000000; font-size : 12pt;}";
00525   myStyle += ".table {"
00526                     "  border-width: 1px 1px 1px 1px;"
00527                     "  border-spacing: 2px;"
00528                     "  border-style: solid solid solid solid;"
00529                     "  border-color: black black black black;"
00530                     "  border-collapse: separate;"
00531                     "  background-color: white;"
00532                     "}";
00533   return myStyle;
00534 }
00535 
00536 QString LaUtils::openGraphicFile()
00537 {
00538   QString myHomePath = QDir::homePath();
00539   QString myFileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(0, "Choose an image", myHomePath, "Images (*.png *.xpm *.jpg)");
00540   QFileInfo fi(myFileName);
00541   QString myName = fi.fileName();
00542   QString myDestinationFilePathName = userImagesDirPath() + myName;
00543   QFile::copy(myFileName, myDestinationFilePathName);
00544   return myDestinationFilePathName;
00545 }
00546 
00547 QString LaUtils::saveFile()
00548 {
00549   QString myHomePath = QDir::homePath();
00550   QString myFileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(0, "Choose a file name", userConversionTablesDirPath(), "*.csv");
00551   QFileInfo fi(myFileName);
00552   QString myName = fi.fileName();
00553   QString myDestinationFilePathName = userConversionTablesDirPath() + myName;
00554   return myDestinationFilePathName;
00555 }
